title: Screen turns black after champ select and I can still here in-game sound.
body:
Problem in title, got leaver buster for this. 
This has been happening multiple times in the new client.
Is there any fix for this?
Can I get the leaver buster reverted?

replies.body:
We can't revert the leaverbuster penalty since we're locked out of making any changes to that system, but we can troubleshoot this issue together.

Due to the specifics regarding this issue, it sounds like your game client is accessing your audio card, but is encountering an issue accessing your display driver. I'd recommend working through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure all your drivers and power settings are set properly.

Let me know if this caused any change.

If you have an intel processor and are on windows 10 you should go to their website where you can download the program used for updating things, just do so update whatever pops up, then update windows in the update tab in your settings. try this and load up a custom game to see if it fixes it.
Well if it's the new client, just use the legacy client for a while until the new one is out of beta and fully released. Leaver buster doesn't get reverted though.
used legacy and it still happened
